com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.model

Class AbstractMockEc2Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.model.AbstractMockEc2Instance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultMockEc2Instance

    public abstract class AbstractMockEc2Instance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Generic class for mock ec2 instance, with basic simulation of behaviors and states of genuine ec2 instances' life cycle. Any extra implementation of more customized ec2 mock instances should extend this class (and override the events) and be defined as "ec2.instance.class" in aws-mock.properties (or if not overridden, as defined in aws-mock-default.properties). To simulate actual ec2 instances, we have an internal timer in each object of mock ec2 instance that continuously check and set the states of it, within the life cycle of start-pending-running-stopping-stopped-terminated for a single ec2 instance, and with random time deviations (e.g. random boot/shutdown time within predefined values).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Enumeration of all instance states.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean booting
      Flag that indicates whether this is ec2 instance is booting (pending).
      protected java.lang.String imageId
      AMI for this ec2 instance.
      protected java.lang.String instanceID
      instance ID, randomly assigned on creating.
      protected AbstractMockEc2Instance.InstanceType instanceType
      Instance type, by default is "m1.small".
      protected boolean internalTimerInitialized
      Flag that indicates whether internal timer of this mock ec2 instance has been started (on instance start()).
      protected java.lang.String pubDns
      Randomly assigned public dns name for this ec2 instance (dns name is assigned each time instance is started).
      protected boolean running
      Flag that indicates whether this is ec2 instance is running (started).
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> securityGroups
      Security groups for this ec2 instance.
      protected boolean stopping
      Flag that indicates whether this is ec2 instance is stopping (shutting-down).
      protected boolean terminated
      Flag that indicates whether this is ec2 instance is terminated.

      • onInternalTimer

        public abstract void onInternalTimer()
        Triggered on arriving interval of the internal timer of mock ec2 instance.
        Note that if this method does things that take a long time, the interval would be prolonged and consequent events/state changing would always be delayed.
        See Also:
        #TIMER_INTERVAL_MILLIS
